thread.title: Winchester Deadly Passion is in Brow Tine Paradise, This Sunday on Sportsman Channel
thread.title_full: Winchester Deadly Passion is in Brow Tine Paradise, This Sunday on Sportsman Channel

author: Michelle Scheuermann
title: Winchester Deadly Passion is in Brow Tine Paradise, This Sunday on Sportsman Channel
text:
Winchester Deadly Passion is in Brow Tine Paradise, This Sunday on Sportsman Channel Video | Posted on by Michelle Scheuermann Winchester Deadly Passion 
MINNETONKA, MN; ( Ammoland.Com ) — Self-guided hunts require strategy and an in-depth knowledge of the lay of the land. Melissa Bachman, host of Winchester Deadly Passion , is prepared with both, as she returns to South Dakota for a chance at a giant whitetail. Rattling and decoys are just a few of the tricks up her sleeve, but she’ll have to pull from her extensive experience to maintain composure on one of her most intense bowhunts of the season. Tune in to Winchester Deadly Passion , on Sportsman Channel Sunday, October 25 at 11:30 a.m. ET. 
Watch a sneak peek here: http://www.thesportsmanchannel.com/shows/winchesters-deadly-passion/ 
Bachman is familiar with whitetail hunting in East River, South Dakota, as she returns year after year, scouting the land and learning whitetail patterns. Her in-depth knowledge will bring her face-to-face with one of the biggest bucks she’s ever seen in the area. A combination of rattling, calling and decoys keep big game from wandering back into the woods. Now it’s up to Bachman to get the right shot. It’s early morning, and not quite light enough to draw her bow. The huntress must work to remain at ease as she prepares to, hopefully, harvest the biggest buck she’s seen. 
“I’d been sitting in a blind all morning, so seeing that monster buck in front of me was really exciting,” said Bachman. “The adrenaline was really kicking in, but I knew it was too dark. Timing is everything, and I had to make sure I was spot on before making any moves.” 
Learn more about Winchester Deadly Passion at http://MelissaBachman.Com on, Instagram at http://Instagram.com/Melissa_Bachman and http://Facebook.Com/WinchesterDeadlyPassion 
About Winchester Deadly Passion : Every good hunter needs a solid role model, and Melissa Bachman, host of Winchester Deadly Passion , fits that bill perfectly with a unique ability to share her love for hunting with passionate fans and viewers. Winchester Deadly Passion is 26 weeks of non-stop action and pure entertainment as Melissa travels the globe going head-to-head with everything from world-class red stag and thousand pound gators to Boone and Crocket whitetails and thunderous bull elk. With rifle, bow or shotgun in hand, Melissa’s fast-paced, in-the-moment hunting style will keep you on the edge of your seat, while her expertise and decades of experience give viewers useful tips and strategies they can use afield. 
About Winchester Ammunition 
Winchester, The American Legend™, is a global leader in sporting, law enforcement, military and personal defense ammunition production. Winchester continues to raise the bar with new products like Long Beard™ XR™ and W Train and Defend™ personal defense ammunition.
